overview: Join Barney and all the kids as they put on their own circus, featuring clowns, ponies, flying squirrels, a strong man, a human cannonball, and much more. Includes fourteen songs including: "Animal Fair," " Puttin' On A Show", "When The Circus Comes To Town," "Marching Song," "The Rainbow Song," "Laugh With Me," "Boom Boom Ain't It Great To Be Crazy," "The Squirrel On The Flying Trapeze"
title: Barney's Super Singing Circus
